snippet: Officials said Vladimir Strelchenko’s resignation as mayor of a Moscow suburb was unrelated to attacks on critics, including a newspaper editor who was beaten nearly to death four years ago.
lead_paragraph: Officials said Vladimir Strelchenko’s resignation as mayor of a Moscow suburb was unrelated to attacks on critics, including a newspaper editor who was beaten nearly to death four years ago.

headline.seo: Mayor at Center of Protests Outside Moscow Resigns
headline.main: Russian Mayor at Center of Protests Resigns
headline.print_headline: Russian Mayor at Center of Protests Resigns
